findings.title: User’s Lockdown period resets after withdraw()
findings.description: The lockdown period of a user resets when they make a withdrawal.

findings.title: Loops in updateStartBlock() and massUpdatePools() may run out of gas
findings.description: The function updateStartBlock() and massUpdatePools(), has loops which may run out of gas if a significant amount of pools are added to the contract.

findings.title: Deposits and withdrawals will revert when token maximum supply is reached
findings.description: When the maximum supply is reached, the _mint function will revert, causing updatePool() to fail. This means both deposit and withdrawals will not work.

findings.title: Unused events can be removed from the code to save deployment costs
findings.description: The unused events can be removed from the code to save deployment costs.

findings.title: Mint Function Will Fail
findings.description: When the maximum supply is reached, the _mint function will revert, causing updatePool() to fail. This means both deposit and withdrawals will not work.
